price: ហើយជាការពិតណាស់ យើងបានជួយសង្គ្រោះអំបូរ អ៊ីស្រាអែលអំពីទណ្ឌកម្មដ៏អាម៉ាស់។
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَجَّيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡمُهِينِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walaqad najjaynā banī is'rāīla mina al-ʿadhābi al-muhīni
